Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LqhDfsin (natural AMPs; defensin, UCSS1a; 3S=S, scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (97.37%) toscorpion defensinC=R=G: 16%. GRAVY: -0.65; mol Wt: 4326.013; mol formula: C181H281N63O48S6; mol ex coeff: 3355.Chemical modification: 3 disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus (MIC 0.25-1 uM) and S. epidermidis (MIC 0.33-0.42 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
Literature Information.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria
